LicenseType.name: LicenseType
LicenseType.documentation: A data type for License type

spd:Class.name: License
spd:Class.comment: A License represents a copyright license. The SPDX license list website is annotated with these properties (using RDFa) to allow license data published there to be easily processed. The license list is populated in accordance with the License List fields guidelines. These guidelines are not normative and may change over time. SPDX tooling should not rely on values in the license list conforming to the current guidelines.

PropertyIndicatorSimpleType.name: PropertyIndicatorSimpleType
PropertyIndicatorSimpleType.documentation: A data type for the boolean indication of a property existence. True if known. False if not or not known.

IsDeprecatedLicenseIdType.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseIdType
IsDeprecatedLicenseIdType.documentation: A data type that indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

spd:Datatype.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseIdType
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the license is is Deprecated.

IsFsfLibreType.name: IsFsfLibreType
IsFsfLibreType.documentation: A data type to indicate if the license is is FSF Libre.

spd:Datatype.name: IsFsfLibre
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the license is is FSF Libre.

IsOsiApprovedType.name: IsOsiApprovedType
IsOsiApprovedType.documentation: A data type for Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

spd:Datatype.name: IsOsiApproved
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

LicenseIdType.name: LicenseIdType
LicenseIdType.documentation: A data type for A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form "LicenseRef-"[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ".", "-" or "+".

spd:Datatype.name: LicenseId
spd:Datatype.comment: A human readable short form license identifier for a license. The license ID is iether on the standard license oist or the form "LicenseRef-"[idString] where [idString] is a unique string containing letters, numbers, ".", "-" or "+".

LicenseTextType.name: LicenseTextType
LicenseTextType.documentation: A data type for Full text of the license.

NameType.name: NameType
NameType.documentation: A data type for The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

spd:Datatype.name: Name
spd:Datatype.comment: The full human readable name of the item. This should include version information when applicable.

SeeAlsoType.name: SeeAlsoType
SeeAlsoType.documentation: A data type for rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

spd:Datatype.name: SeeAlso
spd:Datatype.comment: rdfs:seeAlso is an instance of rdf:Property that is used to indicate a resource that might provide additional information about the subject resource.

StandardLicenseHeaderType.name: StandardLicenseHeaderType
StandardLicenseHeaderType.documentation: A data type for License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

spd:Datatype.name: StandardLicenseHeader
spd:Datatype.comment: License author's preferred text to indicated that a file is covered by the license.

StandardLicenseTemplateType.name: StandardLicenseTemplateType
StandardLicenseTemplateType.documentation: A data type for License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format information.

spd:Datatype.name: StandardLicenseTemplate
spd:Datatype.comment: License template which describes sections of the license which can be varied. See License Template section of the specification for format information.

IsDeprecatedLicenseId.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseId
IsDeprecatedLicenseId.documentation: A data item that indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

spd:Datatype.name: IsDeprecatedLicenseId
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the license id is Deprecated.

IsFsfLibre.name: IsFsfLibre
IsFsfLibre.documentation: A data item to indicate if the license is FSF Libre.

spd:Datatype.name: IsFsfLibre
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the license is is FSF Libre.

IsOsiApproved.name: IsOsiApproved
IsOsiApproved.documentation: A data type for Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.

spd:Datatype.name: IsOsiApproved
spd:Datatype.comment: Indicates if the OSI has approved the license.
